nodes.documentation:
cancel one time link by owner
@param _hash the hash of the link
nodes.name: cancel

params._amount: the amount payable by the link
params._from: the address of the depositor (used to be compatible with approveandcall)
params._hash: to unique one time link code hashed (sha3)

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._code: the code of the one time link that once sha3 matches existing link

cancel(bytes32).notice: cancel one time link by owner

deposit(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Deposit funds into a one time link

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

withdraw(string).notice: withdraw funds from a one time link
